title: Roast loin of venison with haggis ravioli and game consommé
description: The deliciously rich flavour of venison is served here in an imaginative combination of fine Scottish ingredients, Italian pasta making and a dash of French culinary skill.Equipment and preparation: you will need a pasta machine, a steamer and a 2.5-3.5cm/1-1½in biscuit cutter
ingredients: 1.5 litres/2½ pints strong brown venison stock
½ tsp olive oil, plus extra for drizzling
1 free-range egg, beaten for egg wash
salt and freshly ground black pepper
